kpi.name: M5000C279

kpi_info.title: DROPPED MAC-D PDUS DUE TO MAX RETX
kpi_info.use: Number of dropped MAC-d PDUs due to maximum number of retransmissions. This counter includes PDUs of all sizes. UPDATED: When a MAC-d PDU is dropped due to maximum number of retransmissions.

kpi.kpi_alias: DROPPED MAC-D PDUS DUE TO MAX RETX
